info.name: CBD Coffee Table 120x65cm
info.LongDescription:
OVERVIEW
Dress up your living room with the urban sophistication of a CBD glass side table. There’s an immediate attraction to the architectural simplicity in its design, and of all the other tables in the CBD range. A hand-welded, square-section metal frame supports a thick-cut tempered glass top with a polished edge, creating a console, which is a striking example of geometric symmetry. 
Also offered as round dining tables, coffee tables that feature a stylish crisscross base, as well as rectangular coffee tables and consoles with a box-shaped base, the CBD range offers great functionality in the home. The range suits a number of looks, too, from Urban Industrial to High-tech Modern, depending on whether a powder-coated white or brushed nickel finish on the framework is chosen.
 
“Adding a couple of CBD side tables to a room finishes off a contemporary uptown look,” Freedom furniture buyer.
